team.name: Dr. Alex Kisitu
team.description: Dr. Alex Kisitu is a dedicated eye care professional with years of experience in providing comprehensive vision care services. Our practice focuses on personalized care and the latest in eye care technology.

services.title: Comprehensive Eye Exams
services.description: Complete eye health evaluations using the latest diagnostic technology.
services.details: Our comprehensive eye exams include vision testing, eye pressure measurement, and retinal examination to detect early signs of eye diseases.

services.title: Contact Lens Fittings
services.description: Expert consultation and fitting for all types of contact lenses.
services.details: We offer fitting for daily, weekly, monthly, and specialty contact lenses including toric and multifocal designs.

services.title: Prescription Glasses
services.description: Wide selection of frames and the latest lens technology.
services.details: Choose from hundreds of designer and budget-friendly frames with advanced lens options including anti-reflective coating and blue light protection.

services.title: Eye Disease Management
services.description: Advanced diagnosis and treatment of glaucoma, cataracts, and macular degeneration.
services.details: Early detection and ongoing management of serious eye conditions to preserve your vision.

services.title: Pediatric Eye Care
services.description: Specialized care for children's vision development and eye health.
services.details: Child-friendly examinations to ensure proper vision development and early detection of issues.

services.title: Diabetic Eye Care
services.description: Regular monitoring and treatment for diabetes-related eye conditions.
services.details: Specialized screening and treatment to prevent diabetic retinopathy and other complications.

testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.text: Dr. Alex completely changed my life! I had been struggling with poor vision for years. After my first visit, I was fitted with the perfect prescription glasses. The difference was immediate and amazing!

testimonials.name: Michael Chen
testimonials.text: The team at Dr. Alex's practice is incredibly professional and caring. They detected my glaucoma early and helped me manage it effectively. I'm grateful for their expertise.

testimonials.name: Amanda Foster
testimonials.text: As a mother of three, finding time for eye care was challenging. Dr. Alex's flexible scheduling and comprehensive family care made it so much easier. All my children love coming here!

hero.title: Dr. Alex Kisitu
hero.subtitle: Personal Eye Care just for you!
hero.description: Providing comprehensive eye care services with the latest technology and personalized attention. Your vision is our priority.

about.title: About Dr. Alex Kisitu
about.subtitle: Dedicated to Your Vision Health
about.description: Our practice combines years of experience with the latest technology to provide exceptional eye care for patients of all ages.
about.mission: To provide personalized, comprehensive eye care that improves and preserves our patients' vision and overall quality of life.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive eye care for your entire family
services.description: From routine eye exams to specialized treatments, we offer a full range of eye care services using the latest technology and techniques.

portfolio.title: Patient Stories & Well Wishes
portfolio.subtitle: Real experiences from our satisfied patients
portfolio.description: Read what our patients have to say about their experience with our eye care services.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch to schedule your appointment
contact.description: We're here to help with all your eye care needs. Contact us today to schedule your appointment or ask any questions.

sections.title: Information We Collect
sections.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you schedule appointments, fill out forms, or contact us.

sections.title: How We Use Information
sections.content: We use the information we collect to provide and improve our services, communicate with you, and comply with legal obligations.

sections.title: Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By using our services, you agree to these terms and conditions.

sections.title: Services Description
sections.content: We provide professional eye care services including examinations, treatments, and optical services.

emergencyContact.instructions: For eye emergencies outside business hours, call our emergency line.
